name: Enterprise Service Catalogue
description: A catalogue of customer facing services provided by the entire organization.

name: TollFree
description:
Service to provided free to call numbers.

An organizations customer can reach an organization without encurring costs.
label: CustomerFacingServiceTollFree

name: WAN
description: IP connectivity from customer site to other sites via routing and access services.
label: CustomerFacingServiceWAN

name: Fixed Access
description:
Connectivity from a site LAN to a central routing function.

Includes IAD, in the case of PD25 the options are 1Gbps or 10Bgps port
label: CustomerFacingServiceFixedAccess

name: SIP Connectivity
description: Providing  SIP interconnect/trunking functions from a customers site.
label: CustomerFacingServiceSIPConnectivity

name: UPS
description: Service to provide subscription for universal power supplies.
label: CustomerFacingServiceUPS

name: Encrypted Access
description:
Establishment of secure IP connectivity between 2 sites.


Configuration applied onto MNS routers, together with DC Head-End Encryption Routers. \nAlso provides Virtual Encryption Domain (VDC) for WiFi devices & LAN Ports.

Every customer can have an access
label: CustomerFacingServiceEncryptedAccess

name: WAN Interconnect
description:
Routing of IP connectivity between different networks

PIP VRF Can be GNET or LNO
label: CustomerFacingServiceWANCore

name: Facilities and Equipment Management
description: Services including structured cable installation,  rack management.
label: CustomerFacingServiceFaciliatesandEquipmentManagement

name: WiFi
description: Services to provide access to a sites network over the WIFI protocol.
label: CustomerFacingServiceWiFi

name: Telephony
description:
Connecting multiple parties in a voice conversation.

There is a MSISDN (phone number) assigned to this service.
label: CustomerFacingServiceTelephony

name: UC Access
description: Base Unified Communications Account service which gives access to the unified communications platform and self service portal.
label: CustomerFacingServiceUCAccess

name: Sharing
description: A service that allows remote access and remote collaboration on a parties device.
label: CustomerFacingServiceSharing

name: Presence
description: A service that provides a status indicator that conveys ability and willingness of a potential communication partner.
label: CustomerFacingServicePresence

name: LAN
description:
IP connectivity among customer equipment at a site.

Service includes the ability to manage the configuration of LAN switches.

SFP's will be required for each order.
label: CustomerFacingServiceLAN

name: Mobile Service
description: Service providing access to wireless mobile telecommunications.
label: CustomerFacingServiceMobileService

name: Mobile Device Management
description:
Services related to the administration of mobile devices.

Provided on the Mobile Device Management (MDM) platform

Apparently this service is delivered through AirWatch

This is currently known as Vodafone Secure Device Management (VSDM)
label: CustomerFacingServiceMobileDeviceManagement

name: Site Mobile Access Connectivity
description: IP Connectivity from a mobile device to a centralized routing function.
label: CustomerFacingServiceMobileAccess

name: Mobile Service Usage Management
description:
Service which allows a group of customer users to share data usage.

e.g. Red Share

for CSS address voices,sms and data usage.
label: CustomerFacingServiceUsageManagement
